entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
